title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: Image is not refreshed after importing it again.
EB: Delete the image file from outline image and rename another image as 'image1.jpg'.
SR: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view. 2. Delete this image file from outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
